package.name: Cache Magic控制中心快捷小扫把-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Add a button to your Control Center to clear the cache for the entire system. Simply tap the button and confirm the action to remove all cache files and see how much space you have freed up.控制中心添加快捷小扫把清理垃圾！

descriptionlist.description: Add a button to your Control Center to clear the cache for the entire system. Simply tap the button and confirm the action to remove all cache files and see how much space you have freed up.控制中心添加快捷小扫把清理垃圾！
